R

removeObject(GameObject) - Method in class topdown.Handler
Removes the specified GameObject from the LinkedList, list.
render(Graphics) - Method in class topdown.Bullet
Updates the image of the bullet as it travels across the screen.

Creates the 2D graphics for the controls menu.

Creates the 2D graphics for the Credits menu.

Draws the enemy based on it's size and color.
render() - Method in class topdown.Game
Renders the screen and updates the screen constantly.
render(Graphics) - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Renders the current game object.
render(Graphics2D) - Method in class topdown.GameOverScreen
Creates the 2D graphics for the Game Over menu.

Renders the screen overlay HUD for the in-game screen.

Renders the Game Won screen.
render(Graphics) - Method in class topdown.Handler
Renders the screen continuously.
render(Graphics2D) - Method in class topdown.Menu
Creates the 2D graphics for the Main Menu.

Creates the 2D graphics for the Options Menu.

Creates the 2D graphics for the Pause Menu.
render(Graphics) - Method in class topdown.Player
Draws the player with the given bounds.
render(Graphics) - Method in class topdown.Wall
Renders the wall continuously.
reset() - Method in class topdown.Game
Resets the game screen by clearing the game and then setting up the game.
run() - Method in class topdown.Game
Method used as the "engine" of the game, which keeps it running and continuously updates all aspects of the game.
